descriptionHtml:
[color=#0000ff]-Tools-[/color]

[size=3][color=#f4f4f4]SKSE: http://skse.silverlock.org/
SkyUI: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863/?
RaceMenu Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29624//?
ShowRaceMenu Precache Killer: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33526/?[/color]
[color=#f4f4f4]The Eyes Of Beauty: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?[/color]
Brows: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?
[/size][size=3]Northborn Scars: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49279/?[/size]
[color=#0000ff][size=5]Instructions:[/size][/color]
After downloading and installing all mods mentioned above.
[color=#ff0000]Follow these steps:[/color]
1. Download my mod and install it at data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets
2. Open Skyrim using SKSE
3. Load any working save file
4. Open the console
5. Type showracemenu
6. Select the Nord Race
7. Look for the slide option "preset slot"
8. Press F9 and done

[color=#0000ff][size=5]-Recommended Mods-
[/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62844/?]Pirates of Skyrim - The Northern Cardinal under the Black Flag[/url]
PS:For armor just google it.Actually i add the armor but i don't know who is the armor's creator :)
author: RolloTheBerserker
